sentences.en: "Have they been to visit you yet?" — "Just the once, yeah."
sentences.cn: “他们来看过你吗?”——“来过,就一次.”

sentences.en: A recent trip to London gave me the opportunity to visit the Science Museum.
sentences.cn: 最近的一次伦敦之行让我有机会参观了科学博物馆。

sentences.en: Don't expect me to come and visit you there.
sentences.cn: 别指望我会去那儿看你。

sentences.en: Eric went to Seattle to visit his cousins.
sentences.cn: 埃里克到西雅图去看望他的表兄弟。

sentences.en: He spoke no English and was completely silent during the visit.
sentences.cn: 他不会说英语，参观过程中一言未发。

sentences.en: He wrote up his visit in a report of over 600 pages.
sentences.cn: 他将自己的访问整理成了一份600多页的报告。

sentences.en: his first official visit to Britain as Russian President
sentences.cn: 他当选俄罗斯总统后的首次正式访问英国

sentences.en: His visit is intended to strengthen ties between the two countries.
sentences.cn: 他此次访问旨在增进两国间的关系。

sentences.en: I decided to pay him a visit at his office.
sentences.cn: 我决定去他的办公室拜访他。

sentences.en: I was really pleased that they came to visit me.
sentences.cn: 他们来看我，我真是高兴。

sentences.en: I'll go home and pay an overdue visit to my mother.
sentences.cn: 我将回家看望母亲，其实我早该回去了。

sentences.en: I’m only here for the weekend – just a flying visit this time.
sentences.cn: 我在这里只过个周末这次逗留时间很短。

sentences.en: I’ve just had a visit from the police.
sentences.cn: 警察刚来找过我。

sentences.en: Once at Elgin day-trippers visit a number of local sights.
sentences.cn: 一到达埃尔金，一日游的游客就参观了一些当地的风景名胜。

sentences.en: Perhaps you would like to pay a visit to London.
sentences.cn: 也许，您乐意去游览一下伦敦。

sentences.en: She doesn’t visit very often.
sentences.cn: 她不常来。

sentences.en: The building inspector is visiting the new housing project.
sentences.cn: 建筑监察员正在视察这个新的住房项目。

sentences.en: The President is about to wind up his visit to Somalia.
sentences.cn: 总统即将结束对索马里的访问。

sentences.en: The purpose of the visit was to navigate into an ice-filled fiord.
sentences.cn: 这次出行是为了能驶入冰雪覆盖的峡湾。

sentences.en: The reason for my visit had obviously slipped his mind.
sentences.cn: 他显然已经忘掉了我的来意。

sentences.en: The town is well worth a visit.
sentences.cn: 这个小镇绝对值得一看。

sentences.en: Think of the clammy hands you get when you visit the dentist!
sentences.cn: 想想你去看牙医时那双黏糊糊的手！

sentences.en: We fixed for the team to visit our headquarters.
sentences.cn: 我们安排了该工作组参观我们的总部。

sentences.en: We’re just here on a short visit.
sentences.cn: 我们只在这儿作短暂逗留。

sentences.en: Which cities did you visit in Spain?
sentences.cn: 你在西班牙去了哪些城市？

sentences.en: Why don’t you come for a visit this summer?
sentences.cn: 你们何不今年夏天来这里做客呢？

sentences.en: You are welcome to visit the hospital at any time.
sentences.cn: 你可以随时来医院。

sentences.en: You can have whoever you like to visit you.
sentences.cn: 你想要谁来拜访你都可以。

words.tran_cn: 访问；探视；视察；正式访问
访问者，参观者；视察者；候鸟

phrases.tran_cn: 国事访问（国家元首至其他国的官式访问）

trans.tran_en: an occasion when someone goes to spend time in a place or goes to see a person
to go and spend time in a place or with someone, especially for pleasure or interest
to go and spend time in a place or with someone, especially for pleasure or interest

trans.tran_cn: 看望，拜访，访问，参观，上门咨询/服务，（不快之事）降临
trans.tran_en: to go and spend time in a place or with someone, especially for pleasure or interest
